Dwarven Thrower is one of the Warhammer Weapons in Baldur's Gate 3. Dwarven Thrower is a powerful enchanted hammer that deals heavy damage to large creatures when thrown and can return flying to the user. In BG3, each type of weapon has different ranges, damages, and other features (Finesse, Versatile, Dippable, etc.).
